content: I am a master student in Computer Science at Zhejiang University. My research interests include database systems, operating systems, and distributed systems. I have done two internships as a software engineer in DolphinDB and Alibaba Cloud. After graduation, I will join the TXSQL kernel team of Tencent Cloud as a software engineer.

title: Xinjing Zhou
DPTree: Differential Indexing for Persistent Memory
